thread.section_title: e-Careers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of e-Careers | e-careers.com | 4 of 210
thread.title: Gary

author: Gary
title: Gary
text:
I originally had an issue with the course I had ordered, which had not been correctly assigned to me.The problem was I was seeing a different course to begin with. Quick email exchange and it was fixed within 24 hours. I completed my course the following day. I was then told there is a charge of Â£5 for a completion certificate to be issued which isn't very good as it is not upfront and on the ecareers website for the course it states "Complete this introductory entry-level awareness course and receive an course completion certificate." assuming that this is included in the package price of the course.
Course was however of decent length and material for price.
